snippet.title: The Persistence - PS VR Preview | E3 2017
snippet.description:
https://www.playstation.com/en-us/games/the-persistence-ps4/

We cover The Persistence, live from E3 2017. This sci-fi horror game takes players directly into the action (and terror) with PlayStation VR. Navigate a doomed research vessel and try to prevent the entire ship from slipping into the unknowable depths of a black hole.

May contain content inappropriate for children, visit http://www.esrb.org for rating information
